primarySegments.name: Young Urban Professionals
primarySegments.description: Tech-savvy individuals living in urban areas who value safety and convenience.

problemsNeeds: Concerned about personal safety in urban environments
Desire for technology that integrates seamlessly into their lives
behaviors: Engage with apps that enhance personal safety

primarySegments.name: Elderly Individuals
primarySegments.description: Older adults who may live alone and have a heightened need for emergency support.

problemsNeeds: Fear of falling or health emergencies
behaviors: Rely on family for tech support

primarySegments.name: Parents of Young Children
primarySegments.description: Parents who are concerned about the safety of their children and themselves.

problemsNeeds: Need for quick communication during emergencies
behaviors: Adopt technology that ensures family safety
